At  [1-5], the number in the frame counts down from 10 to 4. The woman in the Spider-Man costume nods her head and looks towards the upper right corner. The short-haired woman, holding the camera with both hands outstretched, points it towards herself. After the camera flash flashes, she flips the camera over, and her picture appears on it. She puts down the phone and transforms into a woman wearing black clothes and heavy makeup. She lifts the camera with her left hand and holds it up to her left eye, revealing a smile.

Earlier, at [0-1], the woman in the Spider-Man costume was visible, and there was a number 10 in the frame. The question asks about the number of flashes before she changes into a black Spider-Man costume. In this segment, there is one flash observed when the camera is used. This confirms that there is at least one flash before the transformation.
